patient: I feel exhausted all the time, no matter how much I sleep.
empathetic: That sounds so draining, it must be hard to get through your days feeling that way.
non_empathetic: Maybe you should just go to bed earlier.

patient: I don't think I'll ever be good enough for this job.
empathetic: It sounds like you're putting a lot of pressure on yourself, and that feels really discouraging.
non_empathetic: If you don't think you're good enough, maybe it's the wrong job.
